docs.title: Welcome!
docs.text:
This site is basically a dumping ground for all content I previously housed on various blogs and social platforms. It covers a variety of subjects, however they are all somewhat related, so it makes sense to keep them together (and also only manage one site!). My plan is to organize it better so people with different interests can find the content they are interested in more easily.

The information below should help you find what you are looking for, until I can design a better organization and navigation system for the site. Obviously Home and About Me are self-explanatory, so I won't cover them here.

docs.title: With Line Numbers
docs.text:
Bubble Sort
import tensorflow as tf

docs.title: Highlight Lines
docs.text:
def bubble_sort(items):
    for i in range(len(items)):
        for j in range(len(items) - 1 - i):
            if items[j] > items[j + 1]:
                items[j], items[j + 1] = items[j + 1], items[j]

docs.title: Mermaid Diagrams
docs.text:
See Mermaid.js docs for other options.

graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Error?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Yay!];

docs.title: Highlight Changes
docs.text:
Text can be deleted and replacement text added. This can also be combined into onea single operation. Highlighting is also possible and comments can be added inline.

Formatting can also be applied to blocks by putting the opening and closing tags on separate lines and adding new lines between the tags and the content.
